Entry.Value: Decreased sway in aim mode on lethal primary and secondary weapons while moving.
Decreased weights on lethal primary and secondary weapons to increase mobility, and also provides less recoil when fired.
Increased accuracy with lethal primary and secondary weapons.
Unlock a 3rd support weapon slot. Additionally, support weapon action speed and throwing distance are increased.
Additional primary weapon slot and faster reload on primary and secondary weapons.
Additional ammo for Primary and Secondary Weapon.

Player becomes invisible to enemies equipped with Night Vision Goggles up to [OPTICS+ Lv.2]. Additionally, movement speed when using Stealth Camo no longer decreases and it takes longer to get marked by an enemy.
Increased Stealth Camo Battery replenish rate.
Information obtained through interrogation is shared with all teammates.
Longer display of information obtained through interrogation.
Decreased sway in aim mode on non-lethal primary and secondary weapons while moving.
Decreased weights on non-lethal primary and secondary weapon to increase mobility, and also provides less recoil when fired.
Increased accuracy with non-lethal primary and secondary weapons.
Conversion of enemy traps to friendly traps.
Greatly enhanced daytime Night Vision Goggle performance and detection of [STEALTH CAMO+ Lv.3].
Enhanced daytime Night Vision Goggle performance and extended Battery life.
Night Vision Goggles added to inventory.
Larger enemy marking area of effect through binoculars and wider effective range when using E.LOCATOR.
Reduced sway and recoil when firing.
While equipping the Shield, press the <I=G=CQC> button while sprinting to perform a shield attack towards an enemy in front of you.
Improved Secondary Weapon handling when used with the Shield.
Faster Shield deployment and trigger Shield Attack by pressing <I=G=CQC> while Shield is deployed.
Pressing <I=G=CQC> while sprinting will trigger a Fulton punch action. (Fulton punch can automatically fulton recover the enemy upon strike)
Faster deployment of Fulton Recovery System.
Increased damage of all weapon explosions.
Player becomes aware of the marker being placed for the entire duration.
The duration of the marker placed on the player decreases.
Disarm enemies with successful CQC strikes.
Faster break out from CQC choke and also gives increased stun damage during CQC and CQC throw.
An interrogation specialist. Bullets fired from his dual TORNADO-6 pistols can ricochet off surfaces to target specific marked enemies.

Snake excels at CQC actions and long range sniping with enhanced combat skills. The Active Sonar can be used from the CALL menu to detect nearby active enemies. 3 different types of prosthetic arm features are available exclusively for Snake.

A legendary sniper who can fire a sniper rifle with excellent accuracy. Her movement speed is extremely fast which allows her to ditch the ladder and elusively jump to higher levels. Press <I=G=DASH> while sprinting to temporary cloak and boost movement speed.
